title: TNT冲天炮--自己研究出来的 不知道网上有没有？
author: Time丶流逝
txt_content:
大家好！！
我又来了(*^__^*) 嘻嘻……
由于我在朋友家 没有下世界
所以就文字表达：
[gold_block]代表TNT

[stone]可以是任意方块

下面开始第一层
可以说成是5×5任意方块
[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

第二层是：
大家应该看得懂吧！！
[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

第三层是：
和第一层一样= =
[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

第四层了！
[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][water][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][stone]

[stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]

 注意！！！！
第二层的任意方块上都要有红石线路
而第四层的任意方块上也要有红石线路 但是水的上面是拉杆 
每次启动的时候 站到水里 在拉拉杆 
就OK了！！！
求赞！！！

replies.author: ICE冰世界
replies.txt_content: 死人了，密集恐惧症！因为我还用了爆米花手表
表示看不懂怎么破？不过貌似很腻害的样纸也

replies.author: 懒虫哥
replies.txt_content:
= =
网上早有了= =
楼主你能再水一点吗
或许lz应该自己开发一种新原理的大炮，那样才厉害= =

replies.author: MaiZhi
replies.txt_content: 真心好水啊，都是一次性的，这么简单
